hadiths.text: Abu Huraira (Allah be pleased with him) reported Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) as saying:lie who buys a goat having its udder tied up has the option to return it within three days. If he returns it he should pay a sa' of dates. Wheat is not essential

chapter.eng-name: Ruling on selling Al-Musarrah (An animal in whose udder milk has been allowed to accumulate)
